title: Seeing onions in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: And if a stranger gives her onions in a dream, this is a sign that he will hide his security with a lot of money with her in life, as we explain the interpretation of seeing onions clearly through the interpreter website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying large quantities of onions and is exhausted during pregnancy. This indicates that she will work in the coming period, and she will have a lot of money in her life, God willing, and God knows best. And if an unmarried girl sees that a stranger in a dream gave her a lot of onions and she is happy. It announces that she will marry a wealthy man in life, and he will make her very happy, God willing, and God bless them. Either you see a single girl looking at onions in a dream, and trying to store them in a dream and feeling comfortable, this indicates that she will deal well in her life and feel reassured by him in her life, God willing, and God knows best. And if an unmarried girl in a dream looks at a lot of onions, she is very happy to have them in her home. And she confirms that she will have huge sums of money in her life for the next time and will store them in her house, God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing onions in A dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she sees a lot of onions in a dream, and she is very happy. And it announces that she will see a lot of money in her life, and she will get it, God willing, in the coming seasons. Also, seeing a married woman in a dream, that she is preserving onions in a dream, and preserving them well from mold. This is a sign of the presence of large sums of money for this married woman in life and she is trying to keep them. And a married woman dreams that she is cutting large quantities of onions, and feels very happy in a dream. An indication that he will spend a very large amount with her during this period, and God knows best. Or seeing a married woman in a dream that she is buying a lot of onions in a dream, and keeping them in her house. This is a clear explanation that she will work a lot now, and she will earn a lot of money in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman dreams that she is taking onions from a stranger in a dream and she is happy. It shows that she will have a good man in her life, and she will marry him soon, God willing. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she was eating a lot of onions, and she cut them in a dream, she is happy. This is evidence that this divorced woman sees in Her life has many things, and she will have a lot of money. If the divorced woman is looking for onions in a dream and does not find them easily in the dream and she is sad. It indicates that she will be very tired until she finds the right job for that upcoming period of her life, and God knows best. Thus, the divorced woman in the dream is the one who sees that her ex-husband gave her a lot of onions in a dream and takes them from him. This is a clear indication that she will return to her ex-husband again in her life, and she will live with him in happiness, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing rocks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rocks in a dream: It is one of the visions that has many positive connotations, including the dreamer’s personal strength and his ability to bear various pressures and responsibilities, such as seeing rocks falling from the sky. These are not good indicators that indicate obstacles and trials that the dreamer faces. Any interpretation we give to any other vision, because this is one of the things that can create problems in the opinion, because the interpretation of the vision does not only require the scenes that the dreamer saw, but it also needs to know some other details. And God knows best. Read also: Palaces and fruits of Paradise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing rocks in a dream. Seeing pebbles in a dream can be interpreted as showing many sorrows and fears that the dreamer is exposed to, regardless of the harshness of life, and God knows best. Also, stumbling in a dream can be an indicator On the many funds that the dreamer will be able to acquire - God willing. As for the sky raining pebbles in the dream, this indicates that there are many difficulties, challenges, and obstacles facing the dreamer, and God knows best. As for walking on pebbles in a dream, this indicates the feeling of despair that he is experiencing. The dreamer and the feelings of disappointment and failure that he feels as a result of losses. Seeing rocks in a dream. Falling in a dream is one of the visions that indicate wealth and prosperity if sand and gravel are in the same dream and the dreamer sees them all. This dream also indicates the dreamer’s effort and fatigue, and God knows best. As for the dreamer who Dreaming of picking pebbles, this is one of the dreams that indicates money - God willing - in the near future, and God knows best. As for the dreamer who sees that he is walking on pebbles or dreams of pebbles falling from the sky, this is one of the bad dreams that indicate fatigue, torment, and hardship that the dreamer suffers from. And God knows best. Seeing rocks in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees stones in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the strength of the dreamer’s personality and her ability to be cautious when dealing with others. And God knows best. In addition, the unmarried girl sees the grave in groups, so this indicates However, this girl stays away from the wrong path and always relies on the Holy Qur’an, and God knows best. As for slandering the girl by mistake through someone in a dream, this indicates the presence of hypocrites around that girl, and God knows best. Seeing rocks in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees landslides in In a dream, this is one of the harbingers that she will receive abundant food to enjoy - God willing. This dream may also be an indication of an increase in children or a blessing in money, and God knows best. In addition to seeing a major stumble in a married woman’s dream, this is one of the indications of This woman will obtain money in the coming period, and it will mostly be through inheritance. Seeing sand in a dream for a pregnant woman. A man who sees black pebbles in a dream indicates that he will marry - God willing - girls distinguished by justice and piety. Just like someone who sees landslides. In pain

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a design in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a plan in a dream Drawing in a dream carries many meanings, good and bad at the same time. If someone plans some successful projects, this indicates the large number of aspirations and great aspirations that the pioneer wants to reach, as Imam Ibn Sirin explained in this context seeing gift plans as a new future and good changes in the field of study. And work. What is related to seeing the design in detail in the dream of men and women. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a drawing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Imam Sirin explained seeing a drawing in a dream about searching for the future and the ability to overcome difficulties and difficult responsibilities and overcome them. The plans expressed in the dream come true for distant ambitions and the excellence achieved by the pioneer In his field. If a man draws a beautiful girl in a dream, he will marry her and get from God a stable and quiet life. Drawing in a dream on the walls indicates joy and the arrival of a lot of good news, and drawing people on clothes does not give his vision and portends the dreamer serious illnesses or the death of an individual. His family. Drawing in a dream is a student searching for knowledge in life and overcoming difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about drawing for individuals. A dream about drawing an unmarried girl is a sign of good luck. Drawing in a dream for a woman is evidence of the fulfillment of the dreams and aspirations she wants. Drawing is a sign of happiness and a new job for the girl. Interpretation A dream of a married woman’s plan. Drawing in a married woman’s dream is evidence that all her goals will soon be achieved. Drawing in a married woman’s dream is an indication of a short pregnancy. A plan is an indication of liberation from problems and fears. A married woman’s dream can be a sign of achieving goals and finding a better job for her husband. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of a plan Drawing a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of her livelihood with a woman. Drawing in a dream is a sign of abundant life and good luck. Interpretation of seeing a plan in a man’s dreamSeeing a plan in a man’s dream means that he got a new job or moved to a new job. You will accomplish Also a lot in this job. Also, seeing a plan in a man’s dream indicates that he has obtained a lot of money. Drawing eyes in a dream: Attention to a dream of thinking a lot about the future and can reflect positive thinking and a good vision of what will happen. Eyes in a dream envy and magic, and should The dreamer has to take care of bad company or exposure to friends and family. You may see in your dream that a stranger is dragging you, and this vision indicates happiness, honesty, and a high position in work. A child’s drawings in a dream are illusions and unknown details. In a sick person’s dream, drawing with an eye indicates Evidence of healing. If a married woman sees herself pulling her eyes in a dream, this indicates many problems and differences that exist between her and her husband. Painting on the body in a dream Painting on the body in a dream shows the ability, risks, and difficult responsibilities of men and women. Dream scholars also see that drawing henna On the hands of unmarried people in a dream is a close marriage with a distinguished person who has a good status among people? Graphics on the face

Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother driving a car in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother driving a car in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations for seeing this, except that seeing a woman driving a car may represent the strength of her personality and her control over the affairs of her home, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. It can also show that the woman controls the lives of children, and God knows the unseen. If a man sees a woman driving a car with him, he can lead her to control the affairs of his life, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother holding my hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother holding my hand in a dream, holding the hand of a dead grandmother can indicate good things, and God knows the unseen. Where if an unmarried girl sees her dead grandmother holding her hand, this may lead to speech and she must choose, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dreamer holding the hand of the dead grandmother, this may be a sign of having good friends, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Paper money in a dream: Seeing paper money is one of the common visions that many people search for its meaning and wonder about its interpretations. What is the interpretation of paper money in a dream? Does the dreamer portend happiness and make things easier, or put more obstacles in his way? We will explain this in our article. Seeing paper money in a dream. Paper money in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a banknote is one of the interpretations that experts interested in dreams disagreed upon, as some of them said that it is a sign of stability and livelihood, while another group interpreted the opposite and said that its interpretation is not good. Interpretation: It can be emphasized that the meaning of the vision varies depending on the thing that the dreamer saw. Losing money on many things is not suitable for the viewer. However, if he finds these coins, some signs and signals will appear to him depending on its gender. If she is an unmarried girl, the dream indicates her great ambitions in reality and her constant pursuit. There may be a different interpretation, which is her marriage and her closeness to him, which is noble, just, power, and status. Among the interpretations of obtaining money is that it is an indication of the extent of suffering that befalls a person if the dream is about an unmarried girl. As for a married woman who receives a bill from her husband, in reality she is hearing News of the pregnancy from her doctor. Most interpreters explain that measuring her in a dream is one of the things that depicts the visionary’s dissatisfaction with his life and his continuous efforts to change it and his dissatisfaction. The burning banknote in the dream is among the interpretations that do not confirm the dreamer’s goodness, as he loses some important things in his life. After that, including his health, as he is exposed to a serious illness. Whoever sees that he is stealing these coins in his dream, in reality he needs many things, including attention and good treatment, and if the dreamer is the one who was stolen, then this indicates the worries and dangers that surround him. Paper money in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that if you lose your banknotes in a dream, you are likely to lose something expensive in reality, while finding a lot of them is a clear indication of sustenance and kindness represented by a large inheritance coming your way. Banknotes in a dream are a symbol To achieve a high position and great power for a man, and this is if he sees it and does not lose it in his dream. And if someone sees that he obtained a lot of paper money and took it with him to his home, the interpretation of the dream praises him with the abundance of food in his house and God’s blessing upon him. Ibn Sirin refers to another topic in The interpretation of the paper is that seeing banknotes confirms a person’s need to focus on his actions and deeds and fear God in them, because he may be involved in some mistakes and sins without. Find out. If the dreamer gets rid of his money himself without losing it, then this dream is interpreted as an attempt to remove problems and obstacles from his life, and he will find relief from God in the shortest possible time. It can be said that a married man seeing a bank note in his dream is an indication that his wife She will give birth to a good son who will obey him, treat him well and be his best support.

title: Interpretation of seeing a gift of roses in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gift of roses in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, roses are one of the most beautiful plants that are characterized by the beauty of shape and smell. And its ambitions, and it may be good news that this will happen in this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing roses given in a dream to single, married and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a gift of roses in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that her husband gives her flowers, this is good news that her husband brings her love and affection. And if the woman feels happy in her dream of receiving these flowers, this is good news for her, and she feels great relief from something she is living. God will reconcile them and correct their circumstances. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a gift of roses in a dream for a pregnant woman One of the good visions for a pregnant woman is to see someone giving her roses. The good news is that God will make her pregnancy easy and she will give birth to her child in the best health and wellness and will not suffer from any health problems, God willing, during her pregnancy. When a pregnant woman sees that she is giving someone flowers in her dream, this vision indicates the friendliness and love that this woman has for this person and the depth of the good relations between them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gift of roses in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that someone gave her white roses, this means that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from a person with high morals and spirit. When an unmarried girl sees that she is giving someone a bouquet of roses, this vision indicates the girl's desire to marry that person. If the roses are red, this vision is a warning to her that there is someone who is pursuing her and wants to harm her, or that there is a man who is proposing to her, but this man will not be the right husband for her and her. She will live with him in misery and sadness. And if a stranger gives roses to a single girl in her dream, this dream warns the girl against dealing with strangers whom she does not know well, because there are those who want to harm her, and it was said that the interpretation of this vision is that this girl is being deceived by someone who cheats on her with love, so she should warn him and stay away from him immediately. Whoever sees in her dream that she is putting roses on the grave of a dead person, this girl is full of painful memories that she cannot get rid of. Continue her life. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a gift of roses in a dream for a man If a man sees in a dream that he is giving a woman red roses, this dream shows the man's deep desire to communicate with this woman and marry her, but he cannot tell her. And when he dreams that he is giving her white roses, this indicates his desire to form a good friendship between him and this woman and that he has all feelings of appreciation and respect for her. If a man sees in his dream that he is giving his family flowers, this vision shows the good feelings he feels towards them, as well as the depth of the family ties between them and means that the dreamer is interested in the bond. Mercy. Most dreams related to roses in a dream are associated with some psychological signs and symptoms related to the dreamer at the time of seeing the dream and reflect his impression of the people and things happening around him, whether positive or negative.

Someone you must be careful and careful about may express it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married woman sees someone conspiring against her, this may indicate that there is someone conspiring against her and she must be careful. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a hated person In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a hateful person in a dream could be an indication of some hateful people, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a hateful person, this may indicate his relationship with the person in real life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees an evil man, this may indicate goodness, and God knows best. I know the unseen. When the dreamer sees reconciliation, it can indicate positive changes, God willing, and if a married woman sees reconciliation, it may indicate a high status, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about attempted rape by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: If you see an attempted rape in a dream that indicates a bad psychological state and other interpretations, we will explain it to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, as an attempted attack by an unknown person. A person or escape from a rapist or an act to a sister, wife or son or a father’s deed to his daughter according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of an attempted rape in a dream: The vision generally refers to the affected psychological state of the viewer. Seeing a girl as if she is being raped suggests the presence of a person or people trying to impose their ideas and beliefs on her, In addition to reducing her efforts in life. The dream also shows that the dreamer feels injustice towards his environment in reality and has no desire to change. It indicates that there is a person in your life who you believe has wronged you and is pushing you to do things against your beliefs for his own benefit. If you happen to see as if you are participating in Rape in a dream, this indicates your tyrannical behavior, and it is an indication of the corrupt contract of one who wants marriage, forbidden money, or what comes from usury, and usury is void. The Almighty said: “And do not consume your wealth among yourselves unjustly.” If you see in a dream that one of your friends has been impulsive, then this It means that you will have an accident that will happen to one of your friends. If a girl dreams that someone raped her, this means that she will face problems that will hurt her pride and that her lover will move away from her. If you dream that you are raping what does not belong to you, then you will find it difficult to find a legal right to some property. If you see Someone does this to you, it means that this person loves you and loves you. It is an indication of a corrupt contract for someone who wants to marry or forbidden money. Effort alone without action shows a satanic touch, magic or envy. Harassment can, in some cases, indicate a lack of morals or a warning against the viewer’s bad behavior. In the case of men who masturbate during sleep, it may be just emotional bodily secretions that are not taken into consideration and no explanation should be sought for this. The same applies to women who sleep at night and think about sexual or emotional issues. In other cases, it indicates falsehood or delusion and weakness in Religion can indicate marriage and closeness in some cases, and it indicates the attempt to commit adultery, or revealing and touching the symptoms of ill-gotten gain and money derived from forbidden things, or eating and obtaining usury. Harassment of a well-known person suggests injustice, deception, or accusation of honor, and some say that it is a secret revelation and a scandal. Interpretation of a dream Single Girl: If an unmarried girl or girl sees that someone she does not know is trying to harass or attack her, she will entertain herself with a misleading method called love, which will lead her to miserable topics or accusations in her presentation. The evil act may be closer to her heart and the dream is a warning to her. If she knows the person who is harassing her She must stay away from him and stay away from him, because he is betraying the trust he gave her and a secret he entrusted to him, or accusing her of dirty things. But if she attacks her brother, father, maternal uncle, maternal uncle, or grandfather, or he harasses her, then this will harm her, and will cause her severe grief, or serious illness.

title: Read more than 100 interpretations of a dream about sweets by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sweets in a dream. Many of us love sweets and love that overwhelming feeling of happiness when they eat their favorite kind, but despite our knowledge of the great harms of eating them, such as: weight gain, tooth decay, and other diseases. Interpretation of a dream about sweets in a dream can have a worthy happy meaning. With praise, but it can also be a harbinger of danger or an evil connotation. What is the interpretation of dreaming about sweets in a dream? According to the science of dream interpretation, what was good in a dream usually indicates good and vice versa, so sweets are among the dreams that deserve praise in a dream. But this vision may differ in its interpretation according to what the fortuneteller does, whether he eats it, distributes it, or throws it away, as well as according to the quantity and types of sweets and where they are located. Sweets in a dream often express the happiness and joy that the dreamer will see and experience during the coming period (God willing). Likewise According to most interpreters, sweets in a dream indicate money in most cases, as many of them indicate the abundance of food and the multiple sources of it. It also indicates a person who is living in a good psychological state at the present time, and feels the return of calm and stability to his life after a period of turmoil. And fears. Eating sweets with extreme greed indicates deprivation. But working to sell sweets indicates the beginning of implementing a large commercial project that will bring a lot of profit and profit and will be a good sign for many people. As for the candy that is in a box far away in front of the dreamer and he is trying to approach it to get it. This indicates that he needs to put in more effort and sufficient attention to succeed in his work. But whoever sees that he is feeding someone sweets, and he loves them and enjoys their taste, this is an indication of his kind conversation and words with people, so they always love to talk to him. Interpretation of dreams about Ibn Sirin’s sweets. Sweets In a dream by Ibn Sirin, it basically expresses a person who is happy and satisfied in his life. The Lord has blessed him with the blessing of contentment. He does not carry the burdens of the unknown, but rather focuses on the present. It also indicates success in life and the abundance of golden opportunities available to visionaries, so he should only take advantage of them and take advantage of them in the best way. Wanted. But if someone finds his favorite sweet on his desk, this is a sign that he will be able to get that thing or achieve the goal that he has been longing for and seeking. But to see someone offering another sweet, it means that his happiness is with that person or that he It will be a reason to give him comfort and joy in the future. What is the interpretation of a dream about sweets for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about sweets for a single woman. This vision is often good news and beneficial for her, as it indicates many blessings and distinguished money on the way to her. It heralds happy days in the future, or many Of goals and desires that will be achieved soon. If she sees a stranger offering her a large amount of sweets, this indicates that someone is proposing to her, to bring her a happy married life full of love and joy (if

title: Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing a crocodile in a dream has many interpretations, as it is one of the animals that humans do not domesticate, and in this article we will give you all the possible interpretations of seeing a crocodile in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a crocodileIbn Sirin interpreted seeing a crocodile in a dream as a reference to a policeman or a ladder, Where neither enemy nor friend is safe from it. There is another interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream, because it symbolizes a traitor, a thief. A crocodile in a dream can be a sign of a greedy, deceitful merchant. Whoever sees in a dream that he is a crocodile attacks in a dream, this is an indication that he It falls into the hands of the police and may be a sign that it falls into the hands of thieves and thieves who steal his money. A crocodile attack in a dream is a sign for the dreamer to wake up to the issues of his life so that he does not fall into evil. Whoever kills a crocodile in a dream indicates victory over enemies. Interpretation of seeing a crocodile for Nabulus will be interpreted Al-Nabulsi said that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates immorality, holiness, and fear, and it may be an indication of the extent of the dreamer’s fear of thieves and thieves, and it may indicate the appearance of something ugly in the dreamer’s life. Anyone who sees a crocodile during the day indicates a person or authority who takes things from his home under duress. And A crocodile crawls to the shore, and this is evidence of victory over the enemy and the oppression of the oppressor. By eating crocodile meat or hitting its skin or blubber, this is evidence that he will obtain a large sum of money while eating crocodile meat. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile for a single woman: A crocodile in a dream represents a lion, a hyena, and a predatory animal, so it indicates The oppressor of man. Anyone who dreams of a crocodile attacking and chasing her, this is a sign that someone has an enemy and wants to persecute her. And whoever kills a crocodile in a dream, this is a sign of victory over enemies and success that she will enjoy. The female student may feel sleepy because of her fear of exams. Interpretation of a vision A crocodile in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a crocodile in a dream indicates that she is afraid of a situation or that she is afraid of falling into something. Whoever sees the crocodile and it is calm and friendly, this is a sign of peace and safety from danger. And whoever sees her husband fighting and killing the crocodile, this is a sign of victory and abundance. Sustenance. And whoever you see tearing the skin of a crocodile and flogging it, this is a sign of livelihood that comes after hardship and exhaustion. Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a small, calm crocodile in a pregnant woman’s dream may be a sign that God will bless her with the birth of a boy. And whoever dreams of fighting a crocodile and defeating it, this is an indication However, the period of pregnancy and its troubles will pass safely. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a crocodile in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article on the Shamloul website.
